ygData.subject: Re: Staff Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Well.. I m a lvl 13 wizard and I chose to go with 2H staff a long time ago. I have absolutely no clue about magic staves later in the game, but he way I see
ygData.messageBody:
Well.. I'm a lvl 13 wizard and I chose to go with 2H staff a long time ago.
I have absolutely no clue about magic staves later in the game, but he way I
see it, it won't really matter much since if you are forced to go to melee
to win a fight your in big trouble. Anyways, I could be totally wrong, and
one may be better than the other, that's just my opinion for now :)

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard

-----Original Message-----
From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>
To: EverQuest Mailing List <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, April 16, 1999 6:42 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Staff Question


>From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>
>
>As a relatively low level wizard, I have found both a one handed
>staff and a two handed staff. Which skill should I be working on
>for when I'm a higher level and can get a magic staff? Are magic
>staffs mainly 1 handed or 2 handed? Either? Any suggestions?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Soren
